Source code for model.code

"""
code.py is a utility class to encode and decode data for better conversion re-usable code
"""
import datetime
import json



[docs]class Code():
    """
    All functions in this file are contained within this class.
    """
    def __init__(self, raw_data):
        self.__raw_data = raw_data
        self.__decoded_content = self.decode_content(self.__raw_data)


[docs]    @staticmethod
    def decode_content(raw_data):
        """
        Try to decode some arbitrary content into UTF-8 characters.
        """
        return raw_data.data.decode("utf-8")



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def parse_json(content):
        """
        Try to parse arbitrary content as JSON
        """
        return json.loads(content)


    @property
    def decoded_content(self):
        """
        Getter for decoded content
        """
        return self.__decoded_content

    @decoded_content.setter
    def decoded_content(self, decoded_content):
        """
        Setter for decoded content
        """
        self.__decoded_content = decoded_content
